entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core 7 project takes long time on first load in production #98897
  • Async IO executing synchronously on windows #98893
  • [API Proposal]: `DbDataReaderEnumerator` with `MoveNextAsync` #98890
  • Error CS9137 Occurred When Building a MAUI Project Targetting to Windows #98887
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Combination of generics, ref struct and ref parameter causes type constraint IL verification errors #98892
  • Slower IDispatch calls in compare to .NET Framework. #98788
  • `DiagnosticSource` Filtering Behaviour #98499

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement ICollection<T> on ToLookup #98895
    area-System.Linq
  • Bump main prerelease version to 3 #98885
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_BH_3A` to `SVE_BH_3B_A` #98882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove ProjectN leftover from LINQ's Grouping #98894
    area-System.Linq
  • Improve Regex's FindPrefixes handling for loops #98880
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add backtracking stack imbalance detection to regex source generator #98472
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Delete Module::GetPropertyInfoForMethodDef #98883
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Derive OrderedEnumerable from Iterator #98874
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #98485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME in objectnative.cpp to QCall #97641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reapply revert of https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/97227, fix Lock's waiter duration computation #98876
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Replace unaligned casts in Buffer.Memmove #98812
    needs-area-label
  • Fix ValueType.GetHashCode not calling overriden method on nested field #98754
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • JIT: profiled SpanHelpers.Fill #98879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Interface maps' TargetMethods array should only contain generic method definitions, not instances #98790
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • XUnitLogChecker: Ensure missing stack frames are resolved on Windows using dotnet-sos #98397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Vectorize LeadingZeroCount & TrailingZeroCount. #98877
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVE_GH_3A` #98316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] Don't set RM field when fcvt doesn't round #98857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Ensuring XUnitLogChecker is included in libraries outerloop #97135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet list package --vulnerable` should return non-zero exit code when vulnerabilities found #38994

PullRequests

Created

  • Select the first TFM when `run`ning a multi-targeted application #38995
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Use an infinite timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Extended identifier syntax #7965

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Overload Resolution Priority #7706

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pasting content into raw string doesn't respect smart ident #72267
    Backlog
  • Semantic snippets: `cw` snippet is not offered after lambda's arrow #72266
  • Remove compat workaround for interceptors file path lookup. #72265
  • Doc comment completions should not insert `=""` if there is already one #72259
    Backlog
  • A ton of C# keywords are missing in `langword` doc comment tag completions #72258
    Backlog

Closed

  • NRE in QuickInfo #72245
  • It seems dotnet_diagnostic.IDE0058.severity in .editorconfig started to be ignored with today's VS update (13 feb 2024) #72094

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not return unexisting kind 8441 in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix the log contention in correctness legs #72263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid URI serialization issues in override completion by passing full text document identifier #72260
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #72257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Params parameter is implicitly scoped if and only if `params` is explicitly specified in source. #72256
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Merged

  • Do all parsing work using InProgressState translation actions in the compilation tracker #72215
  • Update target frameworks #72248
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Guard the 'CustomSeverityConfigurable' tag with AnalysisLevel 9.0 #72238
    Area-IDE, IDE-CodeStyle, untriaged
  • Merge features/vscode_net8 into main #72247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • WIP: Reduce SyntaxListBuilder allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce byte[] allocations when opening files #72214
  • Reduce allocations under RemoteAssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState by using ImmutableSegmentedDictionary #72220
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Remove solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move all the MSBuildWorkspace projects under a single folder #72226
  • GetRelative paths accepts paths shorter than the base directory #72166
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Patterns: Allow non-negative and full integer sets to merge (intersect or union) #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve behavior of SyntaxRemoveOptions.AddElasticMarker #72255
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor app template does not respect RequireConfirmedAccount==false when changing email address #54207
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54206
  • Perf regression: mvc #54205
  • NavigationManager.Navigate throws in OnInitialized if component is static #54203

Closed

  • RequestTimeoutsMiddleware doesn't seem to work outside of me manually throwing an OperationCancelledException #54179
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #54187
  • Perf regression: single_query #54202
  • Perf improvement: json #54201
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54194
  • Unable to set Layout for Pages folder in client project of new .net 8 blazor template #54200

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update branding to Preview3 #54198
    area-infrastructure
  • Manually resolve ref and runtime packs instead of modifying the .NET SDK used in the build #54147
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54188
    area-infrastructure
  • fixed DefaultProblemDetailsWriter Doesn't Handle Media Type Subsets #52577 #54158
    community-contribution, area-networking

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • REST API interaction tutorial for MAUI shows antipatterns without warning #20829
  • AppResources.<lang>.resx files get ignored with windows x64 build #20828
  • Color Gray is displayed in xaml editor but Grey isn't. #20827
  • UITextAlignment.Justified not working on iOS #20826
  • Pixelated Edges on Splashscreen on Android #20823
  • Circular ImageButton has edges cut off on Android #20822
  • DataBinding corrupted: not updating values, when it does, it’s alternating with 0 value #20821

Closed

  • [iOS] Gif Loading code broke the ability on iOS to load images without specifying an extention #20782
    .NET 8 SR3

PullRequests

Created

  • Update layout.md #20825
    community ✨
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fallback if user doesn't specify ext on image #20796
    area/controls 🎮, control-image

Updated

  • Android Google Maps bump #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
